955","secondaryNavBackground":"#1e58a3","blocks":"#1e58a3","elements":"#c0c6c9"},"2":{"primaryNavBackground":"#152955","primaryNavFontColor":"#ffffff","blocks":"#214186","elements":"#c94e40","backgroundImage":"organizations/f304d1d0-954c-4253-9373-57536ad87f0d/rg6qey-ramona-background.jpg"},"3":{"primaryNavBackground":"#ffffff","primaryNavFontColor":"#346887","blocks":"#44b0cc","elements":"#44b0cc"}},"hideHeaderTitle":true,"hideLoginButton":false,"showWelcomePage":false,"showStaffDirectoryEmailAddresses":true,"hideGoogleTranslate":false},"alert":{"backgroundColor":"#dddddd","fontColor":"#222222"},"calendar":{"defaultView":null},"headerText":"","footerText":"Assurance of Nondiscrimination
Ramona Unified School District prohibits discrimination, harassment, intimidation and bullying in educational programs, activities, or employment on the basis of actual or perceived ancestry, age, color, disability, gender, gender identity, gender expression, nationality, race or ethnicity, immigration status, religious beliefs or customs, sexual orientation, parental, pregnancy, family or marital status, military status or association with a person or a group with one or more of these actual or perceived characteristics. RUSD requires that school personnel take immediate steps to intervene when safe to do so when he or she witnesses an act of discrimination, harassment, intimidation, or bullying.
Questions or complaints of alleged discrimination, harassment, intimidation and bullying, equity or Title IX equity and compliance concerns should be directed to the following individuals:
Compliance: Dr. Joel Garcia, Assistant Superintendent of Human Resources, at 720 Ninth St. Ramona, CA 92065, (760)787-2016
Special Education and 504: Eileen Highley, Director of Pupil Support Services, at 720 Ninth St. Ramona, CA 92065, (760)787-2041
Title IX: Dr. Joel Garcia, Assistant Superintendent of Human Resources, at 720 Ninth St. Ramona, CA 92065, (760)787-2016
CTE Program: Theresa Grace,  Assistant Superintendent of Education Services, at 720 Ninth St. Ramona, CA 92065, (760)787-2012

Declaración de no discriminación
El Distrito Escolar Unificado de Ramona prohíbe la discriminación, el acoso, la intimidación y el acoso escolar en programas educativos, actividades o empleo por motivos de ascendencia real o percibida, edad, color, discapacidad, género, identidad de género, expresión de género, nacionalidad, raza o etnia, inmigración estado, creencias o costumbres religiosas, orientación sexual, paternidad, embarazo, estado civil o familiar, estado militar o asociación con una persona o un grupo con una o más de estas características reales o percibidas. RUSD requiere que el personal escolar tome medidas inmediatas para intervenir cuando sea seguro hacerlo, cuando sea testigo de un acto de discriminación, acoso, intimidación o acoso escolar.
Las preguntas o quejas de presunta discriminación, acoso, intimidación e intimidación, equidad o inquietudes de equidad y cumplimiento del Título IX deben dirigirse a las siguientes personas:
Cumplimiento: Dr. Joel Garcia, Superintendente Adjunto de Recursos Humanos, en 720 Ninth St. Ramona, CA 92065, (760)787-2016
Educación Especial y 504: Eileen Highley, Directora de Servicios de Apoyo Estudiantil, en 720 Ninth St. Ramona, CA 92065, (760)787-2041
Título IX: Dr. Joel Garcia, Superintendente Asistente de Recursos Humanos, en 720 Ninth St. Ramona, CA 92065, (760)787-2016
Programa CTE: Theresa Grace, Asistente del Superintendente de Servicios Educativos, al 720 Ninth St. Ramona, CA 92065, (760)787-2012

div.data-react-data-bundle: {"notifications":[{"id":7329,"message":"All RUSD Schools have been closed as a precautionary measure due to the Coronavirus. Schools will be closed until further notice. Free breakfast\/lunch meals are available for children 2-18 at Ramona Elementary School and Olive Peirce Middle School from 11:00 am-12:30 pm Monday - Friday. For any questions, call 760-787-2007","type":"overlay"}]}

div.div: Due to our recent closure and the issuance of Governor Gavin Newsom's Executive Order N-30-20 which requires all California residents to "shelter in place" because of the novel coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic, employees who would normally be responsible for gathering the documentation you seek are currently unavailable. Thus, we are not able to provide the records that you seek or make a final determination until after normal business resumes. Until the order has been lifted, you should email all CPRA requests to rseifts@ramonausd.net. You will receive an acknowledgement that the request has been received and we will act on your request when business resumes.

span.data-emptytext: Ramona Unified School District provides equal opportunity in its programs, activities, and employment
span.data-value:
Assurance of Nondiscrimination Ramona Unified School District prohibits discrimination, harassment, intimidation and bullying in educational programs, activities, or employment on the basis of actual or perceived ancestry, age, color, disability, gender, gender identity, gender expression, nationality, race or ethnicity, immigration status, religious beliefs or customs, sexual orientation, parental, pregnancy, family or marital status, military status or association with a person or a group with one or more of these actual or perceived characteristics. RUSD requires that school personnel take immediate steps to intervene when safe to do so when he or she witnesses an act of discrimination, harassment, intimidation, or bullying. Questions or complaints of alleged discrimination, harassment, intimidation and bullying, equity or Title IX equity and compliance concerns should be directed to the following individuals: Compliance: Dr. Joel Garcia, Assistant Superintendent of Human Resources, at 720 Ninth St. Ramona, CA 92065, (760)787-2016 Special Education and 504: Eileen Highley, Director of Pupil Support Services, at 720 Ninth St. Ramona, CA 92065, (760)787-2041 Title IX: Dr. Joel Garcia, Assistant Superintendent of Human Resources, at 720 Ninth St. Ramona, CA 92065, (760)787-2016 CTE Program: Theresa Grace, Assistant Superintendent of Education Services, at 720 Ninth St. Ramona, CA 92065, (760)787-2012
Declaración de no discriminación El Distrito Escolar Unificado de Ramona prohíbe la discriminación, el acoso, la intimidación y el acoso escolar en programas educativos, actividades o empleo por motivos de ascendencia real o percibida, edad, color, discapacidad, género, identidad de género, expresión de género, nacionalidad, raza o etnia, inmigración estado, creencias o costumbres religiosas, orientación sexual, paternidad, embarazo, estado civil o familiar, estado militar o asociación con una persona o un grupo con una o más de estas características reales o percibidas. RUSD requiere que el personal escolar tome medidas inmediatas para intervenir cuando sea seguro hacerlo, cuando sea testigo de un acto de discriminación, acoso, intimidación o acoso escolar. Las preguntas o quejas de presunta discriminación, acoso, intimidación e intimidación, equidad o inquietudes de equidad y cumplimiento del Título IX deben dirigirse a las siguientes personas: Cumplimiento: Dr. Joel Garcia, Superintendente Adjunto de Recursos Humanos, en 720 Ninth St. Ramona, CA 92065, (760)787-2016 Educación Especial y 504: Eileen Highley, Directora de Servicios de Apoyo Estudiantil, en 720 Ninth St. Ramona, CA 92065, (760)787-2041 Título IX: Dr. Joel Garcia, Superintendente Asistente de Recursos Humanos, en 720 Ninth St. Ramona, CA 92065, (760)787-2016 Programa CTE: Theresa Grace, Asistente del Superintendente de Servicios Educativos, al 720 Ninth St. Ramona, CA 92065, (760)787-2012

p.a: Website Hosting Solution Powered by SchoolBlocks

div.h3:
Welcome to the SchoolBlocks
self-guided tour!
div.p: The most common question we receive is, how is SchoolBlocks inspired by Pinterest? SchoolBlocks eliminates navigation bars and uses a block style layout that’s similar to Pinterest. It creates a unique and engaging browsing experience, optimizes for mobile and removes a lot of navigational complexity.
Please click on the red plus signs found on this page to learn more about specific features.
